name: Train Simulator 2021: NJ TRANSIT F40PH -2CAT Loco
summary: Electro-Motive's F40PH line of diesel locomotives represented the face of North American passenger railroading for more than a generation. Between 1976 and the early 1990s, more than 400 of the highly successful 3,000- and 3,200-horsepower diesel locomotives were constructed and served in intercity and commuter service.
